summary: Completed frontend testing of POS header redesign. All 7 features tested and working correctly on both desktop and mobile views.

issues: Console warnings about missing DialogTitle and aria-describedby for accessibility - not blocking but should be addressed for screen reader users

passed_tests: TEST 1: Desktop Header - Hamburger menu (☰) on the left
TEST 1: Desktop Header - 'Ticket' text in the center
TEST 1: Desktop Header - Client icon (UserPlus) on the right
TEST 1: Desktop Header - 3 vertical dots (⋮) on the right
TEST 2: Mobile Header - Same layout as desktop (hamburger left, Ticket center, client + 3-dots right)
TEST 3: Cajero Indicator - Shows 'Cajero: Caja 1' at bottom left on desktop
TEST 3: Cajero Indicator - Shows 'Cajero: Caja 1' at bottom left on mobile
TEST 4: Hamburger Menu Desktop - Opens navigation sidebar with Dashboard, Punto de Venta, Ingresos, Productos, Clientes
TEST 4: Hamburger Menu Mobile - Opens navigation sidebar with same links
TEST 5: 3-Dots Menu Desktop - Shows options: Despejar ticket, Dividir ticket, Combinar ticket, Sincronizar
TEST 5: 3-Dots Menu Mobile - Shows options: Despejar ticket, Dividir ticket, Combinar ticket
TEST 6: Client Icon - Opens 'Buscar Cliente' dialog when clicked
TEST 7: Despejar Ticket - Clears cart and shows 'Ticket despejado' toast
critical_code_review_comments: Header layout correctly implemented: hamburger (left), Ticket (center), client + 3-dots (right)
Navigation sidebar opens from hamburger menu with all required links
3-dots menu shows ticket management options (Despejar, Dividir, Combinar, Sincronizar)
Cajero indicator positioned at bottom-left with proper styling (fixed, bg-white/95, shadow)
Mobile and desktop headers share the same layout design as requested
seed_data_creation: None - used existing products and caja
context_for_next_testing_agent: POS header redesign tested and working. Desktop and mobile headers now have identical layout: hamburger menu on left, 'Ticket' in center, client icon and 3-dots menu on right. Cajero indicator shows at bottom-left of all screens. Navigation sidebar opens from hamburger with links to Dashboard, POS, Ingresos, Productos, Clientes. 3-dots menu shows ticket options (Despejar, Dividir, Combinar, Sincronizar on desktop; Despejar, Dividir, Combinar on mobile).
